span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 摄入，咽下： to take into the body by the mouth for digestion or absorption
【例】 claims that the average person ingests considerably more calories than is necessary or desirable 宣称每个人平均摄取的卡路里大大超出了所需或者适当的范围
【近】 eat, consume, devour, intake
【反】 evacuate, expel 排出；vomit 呕吐
【派】 ingestion n. 摄取

【记】 in 进入 + digest 消化，进入(肚子)以消化
